snippet: With a $600,000 bounty on the line, Lee Chong Wei of Malaysia took an early lead against Lin Dan of China in the badminton men’s final, but in the end he fell to his archrival.
abstract: Lin Dan of China beats Lee Chong Wei of Malaysia in the men's badminton final to take home the gold medal; Lee who takes home the silver also misses out on $600,000 bounty offered by a Malaysian badminton enthusiast if he won.
lead_paragraph: With a $600,000 bounty on the line, Lee Chong Wei of Malaysia took an early lead against Lin Dan of China in the badminton men’s final, but in the end he fell to his archrival.

headline.seo: Lin Dan Beats Lee Chong Wei in Men’s Olympic Badminton Final
headline.main: In Battle Between Longtime Rivals, More Than One Gold Is in Offing
headline.print_headline: In Battle Between Longtime Rivals, More Than One Gold Is in Offing
